info.title: walkerOS Tag Manager API
info.description: API for managing walkerOS flows, projects, and real-time event observation.

post.description: Send a magic link to the provided email address for passwordless authentication. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Magic link sent (or would be sent if email exists)

get.description: Verify a magic link token and create an authenticated session. Redirects to the specified URL or home page.

302.description: Redirect to target URL with session cookie set

post.description: Destroy the current session and clear the session cookie.

get.description: Return the identity of the authenticated user. Supports session cookie and Bearer token.
List all projects where the authenticated user is a member.

post.description: Create a new project. The authenticated user becomes the owner.

get.description: Get a single project by ID. Requires membership.

patch.description: Update project details. Requires owner role.

delete.description: Delete a project and all its resources. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all members of a project. Requires membership.

post.description: Add a member to the project by email. Requires owner role.

patch.description: Update a member's role. Requires owner role.

delete.description: Remove a member from the project. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all flows for a project.

post.description: Create a new flow in the project. Requires owner role.

get.description: Get a single flow by ID.

patch.description: Update an existing flow. Creates a version snapshot before applying changes. Requires owner role.

delete.description: Soft delete a flow (sets deleted_at timestamp). Requires owner role.

post.description: Create a copy of an existing flow with a new ID and no version history. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all versions for a flow.
Get a specific version of a flow.

post.description: Restore a flow to a specific version. Creates a new version snapshot. Requires owner role.

get.description: List all API tokens for the authenticated user. Returns summaries (no raw token values).

post.description: Create a new API token. The raw token is returned once and cannot be retrieved again.

delete.description: Revoke an API token (soft delete via revokedAt timestamp).

post.description: Bundle a walkerOS flow into a deployable JavaScript module.
Generate a one-time ticket for authenticating an SSE connection to the Observer service. Requires project membership.
Internal endpoint for the Observer service to validate and consume a ticket.

get.description: Check the health of the API and its dependencies.
Return the OpenAPI 3.1 specification for this API.

post.description: Ingest walkerOS events for a project. Served by the Observer service (port 3001).

get.description: Server-Sent Events stream for real-time event observation. Requires a valid ticket. Served by the Observer service (port 3001).
Health check for the Observer service (port 3001).
